name: Pan!c at the Penitentiary
description:
You are the warden of Minimum Security Penitentiary and you've been ignoring some basic requests from the prisoners. Now they're demonstrating some civil unrest. You could improve the quality of life at your prison, but it would be a lot easier to ignore them and throw them back in their cells.

But you're going to take the high road and do what's good for the people, right?

No?

Oh...

Well get grabbing then.
